topics.body: So I just had a weird thought. Vegeta always referred to himself as a Prince. "I am the Prince of all Saiyans" was one of his favorite lines after all. But considering that his father, Vegeta, died when Frieza destroyed Planet Vegeta, wouldn't that make him the KING of all Saiyans?
